improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error in line 10.  x will be 0 after the for loop. Add check before division to prevent this.
Unreachable code detected in line 8, since the loop condition will never allow the loop to terminate early.

Potential runtime error. Variable y is initialized to 0 which leads to division by zero error in line 10. Change the initialization of y to a non-zero value or add a conditional check before the division in line 10.
